course_description: Discussion-based course examining contemporary food media from and about Asian culinary traditions. Topics include global Asian culture, Asian America, diaspora, media circulation, race, and ethnicity.
schedule_location: TTh 8:30am-9:45am in New Psyc Bldg 250 (36 Eagle Ro
